description: Charge your Galaxy Tab in the car or at home.Compact & Convenient Charge your Galaxy Tab with a rotating charger that's easy to use in even the most-crowded outlets. Folding prongs make it simple to stick in a travel bag or purse. Or power up while you drive with the low-profile car charger that sits flush in your dash. 4-foot Charge Sync cable lets you connect to your desktop or laptop computer too.
title: Belkin Galaxy Tablet Charger Kit
